name: 王賢達
objective: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅外、可見、紫外、X-射線 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子光譜及質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如氣體、液體層析等。
schedule:
1. Introduction(1 wk)
2. An introduction to chromatographic separations(2 wks)
3. Gas chromatography(1 wk)
4. Liquid chromatography(1 wk)
5. An introduction to spectrometric methods(1 wk)
6. Ultraviolet-visible molecular absorption spectrometry(1 wk)
7. Infrared spectrometry(2 wks)
8. Mid-term exam(1 wk)
9. Nuclear magnetic spectrometry(2 wks)
10. Molecular mass spectrometry(2 wks)
11. Thermal methods(1 wk)
12. X-ray spectrometry(1 wk)
13. Surface characterization by spectroscopy and microscopy(1 wk)
14.Final exam(1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance(30%)
Mid-term exam(30%)
Final exam(40%)
materials: 儀器分析(孫逸民 主編)
